page.title: 20* PUPILS LIKES & DISLIKES *
page.content:
{CONCLUSION OF EXPLANTION OF LIST ON {PAGE 17 OF LIKES AND DISLIKES OF A {TYPICAL TEN YEAR OLD ST. KEVINS MIDDLE { SCHOOL PUPIL.
{7.}YOUNG ONES - IS A TELEVISION PROGRAMME * TELEVISION - A BOX WITH MOVING PICTURES AND SOUND ON IT * BOOKS - THING WITH PAGES IN IT AND WRITING AND DRAWING ABOUT ANIMALS. {8.}COMPUTER - LIKE A TELEVISION BUT WITH A KEYBOARD ON WHICH GAMES ARE PLAYED * 48K - TYPE OF COMPUTER. {9.}LION - LIVING CREATURE, VERY FIERCE * SLUG - SLIMY LIVING CREATURE * SPIDER - ANIMAL WITH 8 HAIRY LEGS. {10.}SCHOOL - PLACE WHERE YOU WERE EDUCATED.
{BY ROWENA CULLEN AND AMANDA VALEINIS {AGED 10 YEARS OF ST. KEVINS MIDDLE {SCHOOL.
